thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very comfortable and convienent
thread.title_full: Very comfortable and convienent - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LDV27
title: Very comfortable and convienent
text:
The location worked very well for us. We wanted to go to Little Italy, Chinatown, the 911 museum, mid-Manhatten and it was great that there were 2 subway stops we could use.
Breakfast had lots of options including hot and cold selections. Tea/coffee available all day.
We did pay more for a higher room thinking we would have a city view, but it was limited by the buildings across the street - so that wasn't worth it. Also, their was an ugly sofa in the room at the foot of the bed which was too big and unnecessary.
Staff was very nice and helpful. Wifi was free since we are Hilton Honors members, otherwise there is a daily rate.
Room Tip: Don''t pay for a higher floor with a view, not worth it. See more room tips
